column4: I managed to get myself into a rough circular dependency spot with apt-get.  I've got a package "openoffice.org-hyphenation-en-us" that wants to be removed, but the remove relies on the script "update-openoffice-dicts" which was previously removed.

The problem is I can't install anything to help fix the problem because it tries to remove that thing first.  I tried specifying â€”no-remove, but that just causes apt-get install to exit immediately saying that it must remove.
